lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: All the evidence points to the housekeeper as the murderer.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: They were the only other person in the house at the time of the crime.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But you're hesitant to announce that because of the housekeeper's statement right?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: It just doesn't add up. Sure they were low on income, but they had wealthier clients than the victim.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: The only other suspect is the wife, but she has a perfect alibi.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It really can't get any more convenient than being away on a trip, can it?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: There's even pictures of her on Ribbitter at all the restaurants she ate at.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Ack, don't show me the pictures. That'll only make me hungry!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hold on...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Did you find something?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's not the wife's food...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But take a look at the meal in the corner of this picture.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: It's kind of hard to see...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well then come closer!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You see that red flag sticking out of the hamburger? That's a limited edition order!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I went with Tai a few months back since it was for a Power Traingers event.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Which must mean...

lines.name: Locke and Keyna
lines.text: THE PHOTOS WERE FAKED!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: She must have taken these pictures beforehand and uploaded them during the trip.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: We can confirm with the restaurants. Come on, Locke. You don't have a car right?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I'll give you a ride.
-- A few days later --

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: LOCKE!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: kEYNA!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What'd you call me here for? Were we wrong about the wife being the culprit?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: No! After our evidence made its way to court, she confessed to the crime!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Apparently, the victim recently developed a bad gambling habit.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: So his wife went to chop him off before all his money went down the drain.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's... one way to deal with it.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But hey, I'm glad we managed to solve the case.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Really Locke... I don't know how to thank you...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Not so incompetent now, am I?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: It's not like I ever thought you were an incompetent detective...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I was just stubborn. I thought I had to do everything by myself.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Another case closed by the genius detective, Locke Enloade.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm kidding.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm really glad to hear that though.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Now you can finally go home and rest! I know this was hard on you.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But if you do, I'll be right across the street!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: ...Right across the street huh?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Yup! I'll head out now so you can get some rest ASAP.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: ...Locke.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Ugh, wait!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Um...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well you know the thing you talked about before...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I... I admit to it.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Admit to what?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: That I had fun and all... I mean-

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Would you...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hey, you alright?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I have no idea what you're trying to say right now.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: WOULD YOU LIKE YOU TO BE MY PARTNER?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait wait wait...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: D-do you mean like as a business parnter or romantically-

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I meant business!!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well it's not like I find you unappealing but well-

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: You're a good detective. You think about cases in ways I'd never consider.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: And...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I-I enjoy your company.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: But practically speaking, our business would be a lot more successful if we worked together instead of competing for customers.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Haha.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's just like you to add some practical reason at the end.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Partnering up wiht my arch nemesis? That's blasphemy!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I see...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But sure, why not?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It actually sounds like a grand plan.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: More importantly then, what would our agency name be?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Oh thank goodness.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I mean, I-I was thinking we could combine our names somehow...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Locke Enloade and Keyna...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I don't think you ever told me your last name.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: ...It's Mustard.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: K-Keyna Mustard?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hehe... Keyna Mustard...

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I don't like it either, but I couldn't change my last name!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I RELISH the time we have together, we should KETCHUP more often.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: ANYWAYS, how do you feel about "Lock and Key Investigations?"

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That sounds like we're a door company.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: "Locke and Keyna: Partners in Crime Solving"?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's even longer than "Open and Shut Case Investigations"!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well I had to make room for you somewhere!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hold on...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright, we can compromise.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: "Locke and Keyna: Parnters in Crime Solving" can work. But I get to shorten it to "L&KPICS".

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: With an ampersand! Because that looks cool."

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: "Lockpicks"? ...I guess that could work.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Huh? Why are you holding your hand out?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well if we're going to be business partners, we have to shake on it right?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wow, you really love your formalities huh. You're even taking your gloves off.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Just shake my hand!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Fine fine.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But remember, we're in this together now. You don't have to handle things alone anymore.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Right, partner?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Of course... partner.
